name: Evil HERO Infernal Rider
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dark Fusion" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can banish this card and 4 other monsters from your GY; Set 1 "Super Polymerization" from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon (except "HERO" monsters), but you can Fusion Summon monsters that must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion", using other cards' effects. These effects last until the end of your opponent's turn. You can only use each effect of "Evil HERO Infernal Rider" once per turn.
